rev.desc.rev.desc: Impossible to save legacy quote request after upgrade to 9.41

if (filename($L.file)="ocmq") then if (not (null(val(bundle.number in $L.sub)))) then ($L.x=val(bundle.number in $L.sub);$L.start.index=0;$L.idx.seq=0;$L.break=false;while ($L.break=false and $L.start.index<=lng(denull(bundles in $L.file))) do ($L.idx=index($L.x, $L.bundle.number, $L.start.index);$L.idx.seq=index($L.idx, $L.seq);if ($L.idx=0 or $L.idx.seq>0) then ($L.break=true);$L.start.index=$L.idx+1);if ($L.idx>0) then ((4 in $L.idx in bundles in $L.file)+=(total in $L.sub);$L.idx in $L.seq=-1))
The Cost is displayed wrong on Bundle tab in Quote record.

if (filename($L.file)="ocmq") then if (not (null(val(bundle.number in $L.sub)))) then ($L.x=val(bundle.number in $L.sub);$L.start.index=0;$L.idx.seq=0;while ($L.idx.seq=0 and $L.start.index<=lng(denull(bundles in $L.file))) do ($L.idx=index($L.x, $L.bundle.number, $L.start.index);$L.idx.seq=index($L.idx, $L.seq);$L.start.index=$L.idx+1;$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.idx.seq="+$L.idx.seq);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.start.index="+$L.start.index);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.idx="+$L.idx);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.bundle.number="+str($L.bundle.number));$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.seq="+str($L.seq)));if ($L.idx>0) then ((4 in $L.idx in bundles in $L.file)+=(total in $L.sub);$L.idx in $L.seq=-1))
Changed the way cost is set on set.fields; no longer assumes that the bundle number will always correspond with the bundle row number.

if (filename($L.file)="ocmq") then if (not (null(val(bundle.number in $L.sub)))) then ($L.x=val(bundle.number in $L.sub);$L.start.index=0;$L.idx.seq=0;while ($L.idx.seq=0 and $L.start.index<=lng(denull(bundles in $L.file))) do ($L.idx=index($L.x, $L.bundle.number, $L.start.index);$L.idx.seq=index($L.idx, $L.seq);$L.start.index=$L.idx+1;$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.idx.seq="+$L.idx.seq);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.start.index="+$L.start.index);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.idx="+$L.idx);$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.bundle.number="+str($L.bundle.number));$L.r=rtecall("log", $L.return, "$L.seq="+str($L.seq)));if ($L.idx>0) then ((4 in $L.idx in bundles in $L.file)+=(total in $L.sub);$L.idx in $L.seq=-1))
